projects.title: Book Store
projects.bodyText: A MERN bookstore is a full-stack web app for buying and managing books online using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. It features book listings, search, cart, checkout, and admin management.

projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.bodyText: An e-commerce clothing website is an online store where customers browse, select, and buy apparel. It features product listings, filters, a shopping cart, secure checkout, and user accounts for a seamless shopping experience

projects.title: Gaming Website
projects.bodyText: A gaming website using React is an interactive platform for gamers, featuring game reviews, news, leaderboards, or online play. It offers a fast UI, dynamic content, and API integration for real-time updates
